agent.name: SpoonOS-Agent
agent.description: Tool execution agent for Web3 operations

get_token_price.description: Get real-time token prices from DEX (Uniswap)

get_kline_data.description: Get K-line/candlestick data for technical analysis

price_threshold_alert.description: Monitor price thresholds and generate alerts

sudden_price_increase.description: Detect sudden price increases and potential opportunities

lending_rate_monitor.description: Monitor DeFi lending rates across platforms

crypto_powerdata_cex.description: Fetch OHLCV data from centralized exchanges (Binance, OKX, etc.) with technical indicators

crypto_powerdata_dex.description: Retrieve decentralized exchange data via OKX Web3 API

crypto_powerdata_indicators.description: List and calculate technical indicators (RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, EMA, SMA, etc.)

evm_transfer.description: Execute native ETH transfers on EVM chains

evm_erc20_transfer.description: Handle ERC-20 token transfers with approval checks

evm_balance.description: Query native token and ERC-20 balances on EVM chains

evm_swap.description: Execute token swaps via DEX aggregators (Bebop/1inch)

evm_swap_quote.description: Fetch optimal swap routes and expected output amounts

evm_bridge.description: Facilitate cross-chain asset transfers via LiFi protocol

neo_address_info.description: Retrieve complete Neo address information including assets and transactions

neo_validate_address.description: Validate Neo address format and checksum

github_issues.description: Retrieve GitHub issues with filters for state, labels, and date range

github_pull_requests.description: Fetch GitHub PRs with merge status and review information

github_commits.description: Retrieve commit logs with author, message, and diff statistics
